newsitem.title: SPAIN: Spain's BBV to buy back 45 pct in Finanzia by GE.
newsitem.headline: Spain's BBV to buy back 45 pct in Finanzia by GE.

text.p: Spanish bank Banco Bilbao Vizcaya (BBV) said on Friday it would buy back from General Electric Capital Services 45 percent of the bank Finanzia.
In a statement, BBV added it would then have 100 percent of this bank, which operates in consumer financing.
In addition, BBV will sell to General Electric Capital corporation its 20 percent holding in General Electric Capital Corporation of Puerto Rico.
Earlier on Friday BBV had also said it would buy back the 1.8 percent BBV stake from General Electric Capital.
BBV said in a statement the deals have been reached with friendly relationships, and they are not ruling out further agreements.
